__e: You put your family through hell, and I for one would like to know why.
Not just the end of the world, Heaven and Hell -- the end of magic.
You've been to hell and back. I know how important this is to you.
- You're the Lord of Hell, for crying out loud.
But I'm glad it was long and difficult, because if I hadn't gone through hell to get there, the lesson might not have been as clear.
I went through hell to find you, and there were days I thought I'd never see you again. And... and now that we're finally together...
You got no idea what hell I went through in there.
Today's no worse than the living hell that is my daily existence.
You have no idea the hell that you put me through yesterday.
